alert.note: Alert for Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; Rio Grande; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 11 at 4:06PM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 615 PM AST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of Puerto Rico, including the following counties, Canovanas, Carolina, Loiza, Rio Grande and Trujillo Alto. * WHEN...Until 615 PM AST. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 306 PM AST, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... San Juan, Canovanas, Rio Grande, Carolina, Trujillo Alto, Vieques, Campo Rico, San Isidro, La Dolores, Santa Barbara, Hato Candal, Bartolo, Benitez, Lomas and Palmer. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.

area.areaDesc: Canovanas; Carolina; Loiza; Rio Grande; Trujillo Alto
